datamap-ve-to-load: Please wait while the visual editor is being loaded...
datamap-ve-cannot-edit-mixins: Mix-ins are currently not supported by the visual editor.
datamap-ve-error-cannot-open-validation-:
Visual editor is unavailable due to errors in map's source code:
$1
datamap-ve-needs-fallback-to-source: This map page cannot be edited with the visual editor. Please use the [$1 source editor] instead.
datamap-ve-experimental: Map visual editor is still experimental
datamap-ve-experimental-content:
You may opt out at any moment via your MediaWiki user preferences in the Editing section.

Be aware some functionality may be unavailable, and bugs may occur - for a list or to make a report, visit issue #149 on DataMaps GitHub repository.
datamap-userpref-enable-ve: Enable the visual editor for data maps when it's stable
datamap-userpref-enable-ve-beta: Opt me into the map visual editor tests
datamap-ve-beta-notice: This visual editor is in an early development stage. Please report issues on GitHub.
datamap-ve-limited-preview-notice: Certain features are not available when previewing the map in the visual editor.
tag-datamaps-visualeditor-description: Edit made using the DataMaps visual editor
datamap-ve-field-locked-unknown-value: This property is set to a value currently unsupported by this visual editor. Source editor is required to modify it.
datamap-ve-panel-msettings-set-view-desc: These settings affect only the viewing experience. Currently, some of them are not supported in the visual editor.
datamap-ve-panel-msettings-field-legend: Hide map legend and visibility controls
datamap-ve-panel-msettings-field-allowfu: Show a button to enter fullscreen
datamap-ve-panel-msettings-field-popupbe: Show like a tooltip (when mouse cursor over)
datamap-ve-panel-msettings-field-require: Marker IDs are used for permanent marker links and the collectibles feature. By default, IDs are generated automatically from assigned layers and location.
datamap-ve-workflow-marker-field-group-d: Every marker must belong to a marker group, which primarily decide how their markers will be displayed on the map. Groups are also used as the main way to control visibility - which the viewer can do through the filters panel.
datamap-ve-workflow-marker-field-categor: You cannot add categories to a marker when no categories exist.
datamap-ve-workflow-marker-field-backgro: This requires more than one background.
datamap-ve-workflow-marker-field-id-desc: This will be generated automatically per the map's settings.
datamap-ve-group-id-cannot-modify: [PH] Currently renaming groups is not supported in the visual editor
datamap-ve-group-article-link-subtext: [PH] This can be overridden on individual markers.
datamap-ve-group-confirm-delete: [PH] Are you sure you want to permanently destroy marker group $1? This action is irreversible.
